verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou Lord hath spoken,
Let there be light!
And as one man oh Lord we turn to Thee.
We now are seeing
Your glory and might
And in Your presence Lord we long to be!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For Thine is the kingdom
And Thine is the power
And all glory forevermore
For we exalt Thee,
Bow down before Thee,
Emmanuel, Thou King of Kings

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thou Lord hath established
Thy name on high
And by Thy power
Draw Thy sons to Thy throne
Father forever, most glorious we die
To live a life that's found in Thee alone!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thou Lord hath determined
In Thy great plan
To have a people called
By Thy holy name.
Washed and made ready
By the blood of the Lamb
A bride made spotless
By Thy raging flame.
